name: Mr. Monster
description:
Dia loves monster, she loves drawing them too. It's literally everywhere in our house. She drew this on her drawing book using a marker, we captured and color it on my laptop. She loves picking colors; like many of us, she's indecisive about her choice too. 
Sometimes she made up songs about her drawings, probably next time we'll put on her voice. More character from her fantasy world is coming. 

They said every child is an artist, so let's let them be.


Drawing Paper, Marker, Adobe Capture & Photoshop.
